body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Son of Ben Harbeson and Mary Paxton Harbeson. Graduate of Louisville Law School in the 1850s. Captain and Major in the 16th Kentucky Infantry of U.S. Army in 1861. Married to Mary E. Shreve Harbeson on June 21, 1866. Married to Alice Andrews Harbeson. Father of James P. Harbeson, Amy Ashton Harbeson, Mary D. Harbeson, Charles M. Harbeson, Robert Harbeson, and Ben Harbeson. Partner with Judge Thomas A. Marshall, in the law firm of Marshall & Harbeson in 1865. Judge of Louisville City Court in 1865.
